sentence: The creation of Finnie Mae and Fishy Mac mirrors the role of ____________ and ____________ in the U.S. housing market.
Subprime mortgages, offered to borrowers with poor credit, were a key factor in the ____________ of the U.S. housing bubble.
The speculative behavior of buying homes with the expectation of rising prices is similar to the ____________ in the Usonian hut market.
The Usonian government-backed hut loans are a reflection of the ____________ role played by government-sponsored enterprises in the housing market.
The rapid rise in housing prices during the U.S. housing bubble mirrored the ____________ of hut prices on the island.
Just like the collapse of the hut market, the ____________ of mortgage-backed securities contributed to the financial crisis of 2008.
The tax incentive for mortgage interest deductions contributed to the over-leveraging of homeowners and a growing ____________.
During the housing bubble, the U.S. housing market experienced an unsustainable rise in ____________ prices.
The U.S. housing crisis was triggered by ____________ defaults and the collapse of mortgage-backed securities.
As the housing market collapsed, financial institutions like Bear Stearns faced massive ____________ due to their exposure to risky financial products.
